overlay.name: gentopia
overlay.description:
Purpose
To provide a smooth, seamlessly functional and enjoyable Gentoo Desktop experience by following the mantra of "Just Works".

overlay.name: php
overlay.description: The Gentoo PHP Overlay is our testbed for new and improved PHP packages for Gentoo21. It's a place where Gentoo developers and users alike can work together on providing Gentoo Linux with the very best PHP support that there is, for any platform.

overlay.name: science
overlay.description: The Gentoo Science Overlay is intended as a place to work outside of the main portage tree on experimental ebuilds. Our aim is to increase the rate of development of scientific packages for Gentoo, but ebuilds in this repository are by their very nature more experimental. If you wish to use them you should be willing to help test and report bugs.

overlay.name: break-my-gentoo-main
overlay.description: Nevertheless the name seems to be standing for something other, "Break My Gentoo" is not just a project to help you destroying your fine Gentoo-installation. It could, but this is not the main purpose. We want to provide unstable ebuilds, which have no chance to get into portage. We want to give technology previews especially focused on GNOME.

overlay.name: fluidportage
overlay.description: Contains A LOT of *-cvs packages for many things, read the readme file for more information.

overlay.name: ecatmur
overlay.description: ecatmurs overlay contains a variety of ebuilds: cool applications, various fixes, version bumps, bleeding-edge code grabs.

overlay.name: kde-stable
overlay.description: This wiki has been provided as a central place for information regarding the kde-svn ebuilds.

overlay.name: kde-experimental
overlay.description: This wiki has been provided as a central place for information regarding the kde-svn ebuilds.

overlay.name: ebuild-exchange
overlay.description: This site tries to provide a new medium of distributing Ebuilds for the Gentoo Linux Distribution.

overlay.name: erazor
overlay.description: erazor provides some ebuilds here. At this point, most of them are newer that the ones in portage, but be warned, they have not been tested much and there is no warranty at all.

overlay.name: fantoo
overlay.description: Portage Overlay tree of new gentoo based distibution called Fantoo Linux. Fantoo Linux aims to be bleeding edge and bugfixes in gentoo upstream.

overlay.name: webapps-experimental
overlay.description: This is the home of Gentoo's wider collection of ebuilds for web-based applications. This is where we collect all the ebuilds submitted to Bugzilla by our users, and make them available in an easy-to-use overlay for wider testing.

overlay.name: wrobel-stable
overlay.description: A collection of stable ebuilds from Gunnar Wrobel [wrobel@gentoo.org].

overlay.name: wrobel-experimental
overlay.description: A collection of experimental ebuilds from Gunnar Wrobel [wrobel@gentoo.org].

overlay.name: kolab2
overlay.description: Project to allow running Kolab2 on Gentoo.

overlay.name: portage-xgl
overlay.description:
Xgl is an Xserver that uses OpenGL for its drawing operations. Together with compiz, an opengl compositing and window manager, it allows for some cool desktop effects.
This is the XGL overlay from Hanno Boeck (http://www.hboeck.de)

overlay.name: voip
overlay.description: Voice over IP related ebuilds.

overlay.name: kpex-media
overlay.description: A series of unsupported multimedia ebuilds for Gentoo portage that are either updated versions, live CVS/SVN packages, or have updated features not included in the official portage tree.

overlay.name: initng
overlay.description: Initng is a full replacement of the old and in many ways deprecated sysvinit tool. It is designed with speed in mind because it does as much as possible asynchronously. In other words: It will boot your unix-system much faster, and give you more control and statistics over your system.

overlay.name: nxsty-glibc
overlay.description: This overlay provides an enhanced glibc 2.4 ebuild.

overlay.name: nxsty-binutils
overlay.description: This overlay provides a supplemental binutils ebuild to the nxsty-glibc overlay.

overlay.name: nx
overlay.description: Overlay for the NX/FreeNX packages for Gentoo.

overlay.name: pro-audio
overlay.description: Evermind's overlay with ebuilds for a lot of pro-audio production software.

overlay.name: catalystframework
overlay.description: This project tries to provide ebuilds for the great Catalyst MVC Framework and many of the related Perl modules, plugins, etc.

overlay.name: vmware
overlay.description: Testing ground for vmware-server and vmware-server-console ebuilds until they can eventually be committed into portage.

overlay.name: java-migration
overlay.description: The current focus of this overlay is on migration to a new build system which will ultimately allow us to unmask Java 1.5, and be able to support Java 1.6 when it is released.

overlay.name: java-experimental
overlay.description: This is the experimental Portage tree for the Gentoo Java Team. Half-baked ebuilds in-progress will reside it here during development time, before they are included into the

overlay.name: musicbrainz
overlay.description: This is the Gentoo Portage overlay for the most recent MusicBrainz packages.

overlay.name: liferea_overlay
overlay.description: Updated ebuilds for newer versions of Liferea

overlay.name: yao
overlay.description: Yet Another Overlay aims to provide ebuilds for light applications to allow Gentoo users to maintain a light desktop without being restricted to the small amount of apps which don't depend on GNOME or KDE libraries.
